headline: Is Align Technology (ALGN) Attractive After Long Term Share Price Weakness And DCF Valuation Gap
summary: If you are wondering whether Align Technology's share price still makes sense after recent moves, the key question is how its current market value compares with its fundamentals. The stock last closed at US$175.62, with returns of 7.0% over the past week, 4.7% over the past month, 12.6% year to date, but a 19.6% decline over 1 year, a 45.4% decline over 3 years, and a 70.7% decline over 5 years. Recent news flow around Align has focused on its role in clear aligners and digital dentistry...
